column3: What would you like to know?
What kind of place is this?

Oh, I like housing\xe2\x94\x80that is to say, I \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03like\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03 it. I roam this fair land\xe2\x94\x80fairest!\xe2\x94\x80touring all the adventurer settlements. You might say I'm a flatspotter. Or a house peeper.
Oh, one of us, are you? A fellow house peeper, very \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03good\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03! You must talk to the resident caretakers then. Connections are everything in this...proclivity.

That cove right there is where Rycharde Mistbeard came home to his hideout. Mmm, lore! And brine! This is Mist, \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03the\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03 residential area for adventurers\xe2\x94\x80and a fine piece of Limsa it is too.

Ah, the Goblet! Now who doesn't want to drink from \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03this\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03, I ask. I was planning a trip to Ul'dah just to see this place, but plans kept getting pushed back. But finally, I'm here!

Now, this one might be my favorite residential area right now. The Lavender Beds! Such a relaxing area, don't you think? I've had a rather stressful few years, to be honest. The quiet life in Gridania, among the trees... <sigh>
I say, is this your chocobo by any chance? He \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03is\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03? Wonderful, wonderful!

The fellow wandered here a while ago, looking rather glum for having been separated from his \x02\x08\x15\xe9\x05\xff\tmistress\xff\x07master\x03. I'm glad that you came by when you did\xe2\x94\x80nothing warms the heart like a happy reunion!
Your chocobo companion has been returned to you, and may once again be summoned to your side.
